descriptions.title: Introduction (Empowerment)
descriptions.content:
Description

An introduction e.g., to crystal buddhas; a kind of empowerment.

Example Texts

  • “Rdzogs lugs kyi ngo sprod dbang bskur kyi le’u”; chap. 29 of the Lha rgyud rin chen spung ba, Tshams brag ed. Of the Rnying ma rgyud ‘bum, vol. 4. ??
